IDS.name: Core_Profiles
IDS.documentation: Core plasma 1D profiles as a function of the normalised toroidal flux coordinate. TBD: toroidal and poloidal velocities

field.name: IDS_Properties
field.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties; it can be placed at any node, allowing this node to be identified as an IDS and to be completed automatically by applications.

field.name: Status_of
field.documentation: Status of this structure 'OK' if the structure was created consistently, 'PARTIAL' if not complete, 'INCONSISTENT' if complete but not guaranteed consistent

field.name: Comment_of
field.documentation: Any additional comment from the source application

field.name: Source_of
field.documentation: Where do the data for this Data Item come from and where are they put

field.name: Date_of
field.documentation: Date of consistent creation of this IDS

field.name: Creator_of
field.documentation: Creator of this consistent IDS

field.name: Homogeneous_Timebase
field.documentation: 1 if the Timebase of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the Timebase values for this IDS are stored in ../Timebase just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various Timebase fields at lower levels in the tree.

field.name: Rho_Tor_Norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate values (= rho_tor normalised to the value at the last radial grid point, which is usually almost at the Last Closed Flux Surface)

field.name: Rho_Tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate (not normalised)

field.name: dRho_Tor_dT
field.documentation: Time derivative of Rho_Tor

field.name: Toroidal_Field
field.documentation: Toroidal field information entering the definition of Rho_Tor, for reference only

field.name: B0
field.documentation: Vacuum field at R0

field.name: dB0_dT
field.documentation: Time derivative of the vacuum field at R0

field.name: R0
field.documentation: Characteristic major radius of the device (used in publications, usually middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane)

field.name: Plasma_Composition
field.documentation: Generic declaration of Plasma Composition for a simulation

field.name: Nuclei
field.documentation: Array of nuclei considered.

field.name: Zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge

field.name: A
field.documentation: Mass of atom

field.name: Label
field.documentation: String identifying element (e.g. H, D, T, He, C, ...)

field.name: Ions
field.documentation: Array of main plasma ions.

field.name: Nucleus_Index
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei

field.name: Zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed)

field.name: Multiple_Charge_State_Flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in the Impurities structure TBD

field.name: Label
field.documentation: String identifying ion (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, ...)

field.name: Psi
field.documentation: Poloidal magnetic flux

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Field value

field.name: dValue_dRho_Tor
field.documentation: Radial derivative (dValue/dRho_Tor)

field.name: d2Value_dRho_Tor2
field.documentation: Second order radial derivative

field.name: dValue_dT_CRho_Tor_Norm
field.documentation: Time derivative of the poloidal flux at constant rho_tor_norm [V]

field.name: dValue_dT_CPhi
field.documentation: Time derivative of the poloidal flux at constant toroidal flux

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...)

field.name: Calculation_Mode
field.documentation: Flag describing how the profile has been calculated : 0-not calculated 1-interpretative; 2-calculated by the transport solver; 3-calculated by a separate code; 4-used value from the previous time step

field.name: Boundary_Condition
field.documentation: Boundary condition for the transport equation

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Value of the boundary condition. Unit depends on type, respectively [1-Wb, 2-A, 3-V]. For type 1 to 3, only the first position in the vector is used. For type 5, all three positions are used, meaning respectively a1, a2, a3.

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the boundary condition (any comment describing its origin : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging)

field.name: Type
field.documentation: Type of the boundary condition for the transport solver. 0- equation not solved; 1- edge value of poloidal flux; 2- total current inside boundary; 3- edge Vloop; 4- not defined; 5- generic boundary condition expressed as a1*(dpsi_drho_tor)+a2*psi=a3

field.name: Rho_Tor_Norm
field.documentation: Position of the boundary condition (in terms of normalised toroidal flux coordinate) for the transport solver. Outside this boundary, the value of the data are considered to be prescribed

field.name: J_Non_Inductive
field.documentation: Non-inductive parallel current density = average(jni.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Toroidal_Field/ B0

field.name: Conductivity_Parallel
field.documentation: Parallel conductivity

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Te
field.documentation: Electron temperature

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Field value

field.name: dValue_dRho_Tor
field.documentation: Radial derivative (dValue/dRho_Tor)

field.name: d2Value_dRho_Tor2
field.documentation: Second order radial derivative

field.name: dValue_dT
field.documentation: Time derivative (dValue/dTime)

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...)

field.name: Calculation_Mode
field.documentation: Flag describing how the profile has been calculated : 0-not calculated 1-interpretative; 2-calculated by the transport solver; 3-calculated by a separate code; 4-used value from the previous time step

field.name: Boundary_Condition
field.documentation: Boundary condition for the transport equation

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Value of the boundary condition. Unit depends on type, respectively [1-eV, 2-eV.m^-1, 3-m, 4-eV.s^-1]. For Type 1 to 4, only the first row in the matrix is used. For type 5, all three rows are used, meaning respectively a1, a2, a3.

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the boundary condition (any comment describing its origin : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging)

field.name: Type
field.documentation: Type of the boundary condition for the transport solver. 0- equation not solved; 1- value of the field y; 2-radial derivative of the field (-dy/drho_tor); 3-scale length of the field y/(-dy/drho_tor); 4- flux; 5- generic boundary condition y expressed as a1y'+a2y=a3

field.name: Rho_Tor_Norm
field.documentation: Position of the boundary condition (in terms of normalised toroidal flux coordinate) for the transport solver. Outside this boundary, the value of the data are considered to be prescribed

field.name: Source_Term
field.documentation: Total source term used in the transport equation

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Value of the source term

field.name: Integral
field.documentation: Integral (over dRho_Tor) from 0 to Rho_Tor of the source term

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); String

field.name: Q_Ohmic
field.documentation: Ohmic heating

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Value of the source term

field.name: Integral
field.documentation: Integral (over dRho_Tor) from 0 to Rho_Tor of the source term

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); String

field.name: Q_ei
field.documentation: Collisional heat transfer from electrons to (all) ions (equipartition term)

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Value of the source term

field.name: Integral
field.documentation: Integral (over dRho_Tor) from 0 to Rho_Tor of the source term

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); String

field.name: Transport_Coefficients
field.documentation: Total transport coefficients used in the transport equation

field.name: Diffusion
field.documentation: Diffusion coefficient

field.name: Convection
field.documentation: Convection coefficient

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); String

field.name: Fluxes
field.documentation: Fluxes of the transported quantity

field.name: Flux_From_Coefficients
field.documentation: Flux of the field calculated from the transport coefficients

field.name: Flux_Interpretative
field.documentation: Interpretative flux deduced from the field data, the integral of the source term, and the time derivative of the field

field.name: Flux_Through_Surface
field.documentation: Net flux through the magnetic surface, i.e. integral over the magnetic surface area of Flux_From_Coefficients

field.name: Integral_DT_Term
field.documentation: Integral (over dRho_Tor) from 0 to Rho_Tor of the time derivative term of the transport equation

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Ti
field.documentation: Ion temperature

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Field value

field.name: dValue_dRho_Tor
field.documentation: Radial derivative (dValue/dRho_Tor)

field.name: d2Value_dRho_Tor2
field.documentation: Second order radial derivative

field.name: dValue_dT
field.documentation: Time derivative (dValue/dTime)

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...)

field.name: Calculation_Mode
field.documentation: Flag describing how the profile has been calculated : 0-not calculated 1-interpretative; 2-calculated by the transport solver; 3-calculated by a separate code; 4-used value from the previous time step

field.documentation: Boundary condition for the transport equation

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Value of the boundary condition. Unit depends on type, respectively [1-eV, 2-eV.m^-1, 3-m, 4-eV.s^-1]. For Type 1 to 4, only the first row in the matrix is used. For type 5, all three rows are used, meaning respectively a1, a2, a3.

field.documentation: Source of the boundary condition (any comment describing its origin : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging)

field.name: Type

field.name: Rho_Tor_Norm
field.documentation: Position of the boundary condition (in terms of normalised toroidal flux coordinate) for the transport solver. Outside this boundary, the value of the data are considered to be prescribed

field.name: Integral
field.documentation: Integral (over dRho_Tor) from 0 to Rho_Tor of the source term

field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); String

field.documentation: Total transport coefficients used in the transport equation

field.documentation: Diffusion coefficient

field.documentation: Integral (over dRho_Tor) from 0 to Rho_Tor of the time derivative term of the transport equation

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Ne
field.documentation: Electron density

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Field value

field.name: dValue_dRho_Tor
field.documentation: Radial derivative (dValue/dRho_Tor)

field.name: d2Value_dRho_Tor2
field.documentation: Second order radial derivative

field.name: dValue_dT
field.documentation: Time derivative (dValue/dTime)

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...)

field.name: Calculation_Mode
field.documentation: Flag describing how the profile has been calculated : 0-not calculated 1-interpretative; 2-calculated by the transport solver; 3-calculated by a separate code; 4-used value from the previous time step

field.name: Boundary_Condition
field.documentation: Boundary condition for the transport equation

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Value of the boundary condition. Unit depends on type, respectively [1-m^-3, 2-m^-4, 3-m, 4-m^-3.s^-1]. For Type 1 to 4, only the first row in the matrix is used. For type 5, all three rows are used, meaning respectively a1, a2, a3.

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the boundary condition (any comment describing its origin : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging)

field.name: Type
field.documentation: Type of the boundary condition for the transport solver. 0- equation not solved; 1- value of the field y; 2-radial derivative of the field (-dy/drho_tor); 3-scale length of the field y/(-dy/drho_tor); 4- flux; 5- generic boundary condition y expressed as a1y'+a2y=a3

field.name: Rho_Tor_Norm
field.documentation: Position of the boundary condition (in terms of normalised toroidal flux coordinate) for the transport solver. Outside this boundary, the value of the data are considered to be prescribed

field.documentation: Total source term used in the transport equation

field.name: Integral
field.documentation: Integral (over dRho_Tor) from 0 to Rho_Tor of the source term

field.documentation: Integral (over dRho_Tor) from 0 to Rho_Tor of the time derivative term of the transport equation

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Ni
field.documentation: Ion density

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Field value

field.name: dValue_dRho_Tor
field.documentation: Radial derivative (dValue/dRho_Tor)

field.name: d2Value_dRho_Tor2
field.documentation: Second order radial derivative

field.name: dValue_dT
field.documentation: Time derivative (dValue/dTime)

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...)

field.name: Calculation_Mode
field.documentation: Flag describing how the profile has been calculated : 0-not calculated 1-interpretative; 2-calculated by the transport solver; 3-calculated by a separate code; 4-used value from the previous time step

field.name: Boundary_Condition
field.documentation: Boundary condition for the transport equation

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Value of the boundary condition. Unit depends on type, respectively [1-m^-3, 2-m^-4, 3-m, 4-m^-3.s^-1]. For Type 1 to 4, only the first row in the matrix is used. For type 5, all three rows are used, meaning respectively a1, a2, a3.

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the boundary condition (any comment describing its origin : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging)

field.name: Type
field.documentation: Type of the boundary condition for the transport solver. 0- equation not solved; 1- value of the field y; 2-radial derivative of the field (-dy/drho_tor); 3-scale length of the field y/(-dy/drho_tor); 4- flux; 5- generic boundary condition y expressed as a1y'+a2y=a3

field.name: Rho_Tor_Norm
field.documentation: Position of the boundary condition (in terms of normalised toroidal flux coordinate) for the transport solver. Outside this boundary, the value of the data are considered to be prescribed

field.name: Source_Term
field.documentation: Total source term used in the transport equation

field.name: Value
field.documentation: Value of the source term

field.name: Integral
field.documentation: Integral (over dRho_Tor) from 0 to Rho_Tor of the source term

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); String

field.name: Transport_Coefficients
field.documentation: Total transport coefficients used in the transport equation

field.name: Diffusion
field.documentation: Diffusion coefficient

field.name: Convection
field.documentation: Convection coefficient

field.name: Source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); String

field.name: Fluxes
field.documentation: Fluxes of the transported quantity

field.name: Flux_From_Coefficients
field.documentation: Flux of the field calculated from the transport coefficients

field.name: Flux_Interpretative
field.documentation: Interpretative flux deduced from the field data, the integral of the source term, and the time derivative of the field

field.name: Flux_Through_Surface
field.documentation: Net flux through the magnetic surface, i.e. integral over the magnetic surface area of Flux_From_Coefficients

field.name: Integral_DT_Term
field.documentation: Integral (over dRho_Tor) from 0 to Rho_Tor of the time derivative term of the transport equation

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Derived_Profiles
field.documentation: Profiles derived from the fields solved in the transport equations, or from experiment.

field.name: Pe
field.documentation: Electron pressure

field.name: dPe_dT
field.documentation: Time derivative of the electron pressure

field.name: Pi
field.documentation: Ion pressure (per ion species)

field.name: Pi_Total
field.documentation: Total ion pressure (sum over the ion species)

field.name: dPi_Total_dT
field.documentation: Time derivative of the total ion pressure

field.name: Pressure_Thermal
field.documentation: Thermal pressure (electrons+ions)

field.name: Pressure_Perpendicular
field.documentation: Total perpendicular pressure (electrons+ions, thermal+non-thermal)

field.name: Pressure_Parallel
field.documentation: Total parallel pressure (electrons+ions, thermal+non-thermal)

field.name: J_Total
field.documentation: Total parallel current density = average(jtot.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Toroidal_Field/ B0

field.name: J_Toroidal
field.documentation: Total toroidal current density = average(J_Toroidal/R) / average(1/R)

field.name: J_Ohmic
field.documentation: Ohmic parallel current density = average(J_Ohmic.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Toroidal_Field/ B0

field.name: V_Loop
field.documentation: Toroidal loop voltage

field.name: E_Parallel
field.documentation: Parallel electric field = average(E.B) / B0, where Core_Profiles/Toroidal_Field/ B0

field.name: q
field.documentation: Safety factor profile

field.name: Magnetic_Shear
field.documentation: Magnetic shear profile;

field.name: Ni_Fast
field.documentation: Density of fast ions, for the various ion species

field.name: Momentum_Tor
field.documentation: Toroidal momentum of the various ion species

field.name: Rotation_Frequency_Tor
field.documentation: Angular toroidal rotation frequency of the various ion species

field.name: Zeff
field.documentation: Effective charge profile

field.name: B_Pol
field.documentation: Average poloidal magnetic field, defined as sqrt(ave(grad Rho^2/R^2)).dPsi/dRho

field.name: ddV_dRho_Tor_dT
field.documentation: Time derivative of the radial derivative of the volume enclosed in the flux surface, i.e. d/dt(dV/drho_tor)

field.name: Derived_Global
field.documentation: Various global quantities calculated from the fields solved in the transport equations and from the Derived Profiles

field.name: Current_Total
field.documentation: Total plasma current

field.name: Current_Inside_Boundary
field.documentation: Plasma current inside the transport solver boundary Core_Profiles/Psi/Boundary/Rho_Tor_Norm

field.name: Current_Non_Inductive
field.documentation: Total non-inductive parallel current

field.name: V_Loop
field.documentation: Toroidal loop voltage

field.name: Li_3
field.documentation: Internal inductance

field.name: Beta_Tor
field.documentation: Toroidal beta (ratio of kinetic to magnetic pressure)

field.name: Beta_Tor_Norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal beta

field.name: Beta_Pol
field.documentation: Poloidal beta

field.name: Energy_Diamagnetic
field.documentation: Plasma energy content = 3/2 * int(p,dV) with p being the total pressure (Pressure_Thermal + Pressure_Perpendicular)

field.name: Code_Parameters
field.documentation: Generic decription of the code specific parameters for the code that has produced this IDS

field.name: Code_Name
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: Code_Version
field.documentation: Version of the code

field.name: Parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: Output_Diagnostics
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: Output_Flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used.

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]
